pr_title: TRUNK-5812:Replace all Junit4 assertThat with Hamcrest assertThat

timeline.bodyText:
Please configure your IDE so that static imports are grouped at the top, followed by newline then the other imports. It might also be necessary that you adjust the ordering of the imports.
See https://wiki.openmrs.org/display/docs/Developer+How-To+Setup+And+Use+IntelliJ#DeveloperHow-ToSetupAndUseIntelliJ-JavaImports
timeline.author: teleivo
teleivo

timeline.message: TRUNK-5812:Replace all Junit4 assertThat with Hamcrest assertThat
